featured.text: No one deserves to be laughed at for their pronunciation.
I overdid it on all the food that tasted good, so I guess I deserved what I got for not dieting properly.”

definition.zh_def: 應得，值得擁有或獲得某種待遇或結果。
definition.en_def: To be worthy of something, typically a reward or punishment, based on actions or qualities.
definition.example: She worked hard and truly deserves the promotion.
